name: Grinning Grave Virus
desc: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 3000 or less ATK; your opponent destroys 1 card in their hand and/or Deck for every 500 ATK the Tributed monster had on the field, also if you Tributed a monster with 2000 or more ATK, check all cards your opponent draws until the end of their 3rd turn after this card's activation, and destroy all monsters among them. Cards destroyed and sent to the GY by this card's effect cannot activate their effects during the turn they were destroyed.
